keys.commands.generic.permission: You do not have permission to use this command
keys.commands.generic.exception: An unknown error occurred while attempting to perform this command: {}
keys.commands.generic.not_found: Unknown command. Try /help for a list of commands
keys.commands.generic.num.too_small: The number you have entered ({}) is too small, it must be at least {}
keys.commands.generic.num.too_big: The number you have entered ({}) is too big, it must be at most {}
keys.commands.generic.float.too_small: The number you have entered ({:.2f}) is too small, it must be at least {:.2f}
keys.commands.generic.float.too_big: The number you have entered ({:.2f}) is too big, it must be at most {:.2f}
keys.commands.text.locale.not_found: That locale can not be found '{}'
keys.commands.text.weather.response.bad: Error on weather service side! API response code: {}
keys.commands.text.weather.bad_token: Weather service API token not found! Please write to bot owner/developer
keys.commands.text.weather.body:
🌡 Temp: {temp} ({feels}℃), from {min}℃ to {max}℃
💧 Humidity: {humidity}%
☁ Cloudless: {clouds}%
💨 Wind speed: {speed} m/s
keys.help.locale: Get or set bot, chat or yourself locale
keys.help.locale.extended:
Use 'locale <global|chat|personal>' for get bot, chat and personal locale
Use 'locale <global|chat|personal> <locale>' for set locale to bot, chat and yourself (set 'default' for reset)
Use 'locale list' for list locales
keys.help.help.extended: Use 'help <command|page>' for another page or command details
keys.help.captcha.extended: Utility command for answer to captcha, use with answer. If can't work, write to bot owner/developer
keys.help.roll.extended: Use 'roll' for roll in 0-100, 'roll <max>' for roll in 0-max and 'roll <min> <max>' for roll in min-max range
